RelatedSentence: , man was airlifted to a hospital on Sunday afternoon after losing control of his paraglider and crashing into a cliff along the shores of Lake Erie , just east of Port Bruce .
Malahide Fire Services had to perform a steep angle rescue of the experienced paraglider , who was in serious condition , Ontario Provincial Police said .
